p: TEAC assay was performed according to Re (1999) with some modifications [ 52]. A stable stock solution of ABTS• + (2,2′-azinobis (3-ethylbenzothiazoline-6-sulfonic acid)) was produced by reacting an aqueous solution of 7 mM ABTS with 2.45 mM potassium persulphate. The standard curve was linear between 0 and 200 mM Trolox ( R 2 = 0.9978). Results are expressed as millimolar TE/g material.
